import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaTachometerAlt, FaStickyNote, FaBookOpen, FaFileAlt, FaUniversity, FaSignOutAlt, FaEdit, FaLayerGroup, FaPlus, FaUpload, FaBook } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Sidebar = () => { const baseStyle = 'flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-2.5 rounded-lg transition-all duration-200 hover:scale-[1.03]'; const activeStyle = 'bg-gradient-to-r from-blue-600 to-blue-500 text-white font-semibold shadow-md'; const sectionTitle = (title, bgColor = 'bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-800') => (
{title}
); return (
{/* Logo / Header */}

🎓 Academic Source

Admin Panel

{sectionTitle('Main', 'bg-blue-100 dark:bg-blue-950')} `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-blue-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Dashboard {sectionTitle('Manage Content', 'bg-green-100 dark:bg-green-950')} `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Manage Notes `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Manage Syllabus `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Manage Papers `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Manage Courses `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Universities `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Manage Departments `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-green-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Manage Books {sectionTitle('Upload / Add', 'bg-purple-100 dark:bg-purple-950')} `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-purple-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Add Dept/Course `${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-purple-50 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Upload Resources {/* Footer section */}
`${baseStyle} ${isActive ? activeStyle : 'hover:bg-red-100 dark:hover:bg-gray-700'}`}> Logout
); }; export default Sidebar;
